generated_body: The article titled "How the Trump Administration Eroded Its Own Legal Case on DACA" is likely to delve into the various legal strategies and decisions made by the Trump administration that may have undermined its position regarding the Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA) program. Readers can expect a detailed examination of specific policies and court rulings that contributed to the erosion of the administration's arguments. Additionally, the article may discuss the implications of these legal missteps on the future of DACA and broader immigration policy, providing insights into how these developments have shaped the ongoing debate surrounding the program.
